text: Sericosura is a genus of sea spiders in the family Ammotheidae. They live at depths from 106 to 3,690 meters in the ocean. ==Species== * Sericosura bamberi Arango & Linse, 2015 * Sericosura cochleifovea Child, 1989 * Sericosura conta Bamber, 2009 * Sericosura curva Arango & Linse, 2015 * Sericosura cyrtoma Child & Segonzac, 1996 * Sericosura dentatus Wang, Lin, Bamber & Huang, 2013 * Sericosura dimorpha Arango & Linse, 2015 * Sericosura dissita Child, 2000 * Sericosura gemmaemonsis Wang, Lin, Bamber & Huang, 2013 * Sericosura hedgpethi Bamber, 2009 * Sericosura heteroscela Child & Segonzac, 1996 * Sericosura mitrata (Gordon, 1944) * Sericosura venticola Child, 1987 * Sericosura verenae (Child, 1987) ==References== Category:Pycnogonids
title: Sericosura
